'''Heated Battle Mode''' is a gamemode in [[Genius Invokation TCG]] available for a limited time available on a regular basis each [[Version]]. Each version will have a special rules that may lead to a completely different experience from the usual gameplay of Genius Invokation TCG.

Heated Battle Mode can be accessed at the [[Invitation Board]] of [[The Cat's Tail]] once the player has reached [[Player Level]] 4.
